oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Erratum
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Millière, Raphaël
Metzinger, Thomas
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: On p. 3 of the introduction, a distorting typing error has crept into the text. Instead of “Just like the light that turns off whenever one looks in the refrigerator, it might be the case […]” it should of course read “Just like the light that turns ON whenever one looks in the refrigerator, it might be the case […].”
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Philosophy and the Mind Sciences; Vol. 1 No. I (2020): Special Issue: Radical Disruptions of Self-Consciousness
